attributes.title: Computer Vision Engineer
attributes.desc:
Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.
Minimum of 2 years of industry experience in computer vision.
Proficiency in C++ and Python programming languages.
Strong understanding of machine learning algorithms and frameworks.
Experience with libraries such as OpenCV, TensorFlow, or PyTorch.
Familiarity with GPU programming and CUDA is a plus.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
attributes.responsibilities:
Design, develop, and optimize computer vision algorithms and applications.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate computer vision solutions into products.
Work on real-time processing and analysis of image and video data.
Implement and maintain code in C++ and Python for high-performance computing.
Conduct performance evaluations and optimize existing systems for speed and accuracy.
Stay updated with the latest advancements in computer vision and machine learning.
attributes.benefits:
Be part of an innovative company that values creativity and excellence.
Work with a talented team of professionals in a collaborative environment.
Competitive salary and benefits package.
Opportunities for professional growth and development.

attributes.title: Junior Graphics Designer
attributes.desc:
Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design, Multimedia Design, or a related field.
Up to 2 years of experience in graphic design, with a strong focus on digital platforms.
Proficiency in Figma for UI/UX design.
Basic experience in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
Strong understanding of design principles, typography, color theory, and layout.
A portfolio showcasing your design skills across digital mediums and basic video editing work.
Ability to multitask and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset.
Willingness to learn and adapt in a fast-paced environment.
attributes.responsibilities:
Create and refine designs for digital platforms using Figma, ensuring a cohesive and user-friendly experience.
Assist in the development of marketing materials, including social media graphics, website assets, and email campaigns.
Perform basic video editing tasks, including trimming, adding transitions, and overlaying text/graphics.
Collaborate with senior designers and other team members to bring creative concepts to life.
Contribute to brainstorming sessions with fresh ideas and innovative design solutions.
Ensure consistency with brand guidelines across all visual content.
Stay updated with the latest design and video editing trends and tools.
attributes.benefits:
Be part of a creative team that values innovation and continuous learning.
Work on diverse projects that challenge and expand your skill set.
Access to mentorship opportunities and professional development resources.
Competitive salary and benefits package.
A supportive and collaborative work culture.
